name: Poison Toxin
description:
poisons your weapon so attacks have a chance to afflict targets with Severe Poison.

When used together with Diffusion, poisoned enemies have their movement slowed and take damage scaling with Pips spent:

1 Pip: 79 + 79% Weapon Damage 
2 Pips: 158 + 158% Weapon Damage 
3 Pips: 237 + 237% Weapon Damage 
4 Pips: 316 + 316% Weapon Damage 
5 Pips: 397 + 397% Weapon Damage

Only 1 Toxin can be equipped at a time.
